contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map.Ujiie-Town.Tochigi.PNG|thumb|Map of Ujiie, Tochigi]] {{nihongo|'''Ujiie'''|氏家町|Ujiie-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Shioya District, Tochigi|Shioya District]], [[Tochigi Prefecture|Tochigi]], [[Japan]]. On March 28, 2005 Ujiie was merged with the town [[Kitsuregawa, Tochigi|Kitsuregawa]], also from [[Shioya District, Tochigi|Shioya District]], to form the new city of [[Sakura, Tochigi|Sakura]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 29,898 and a [[population density|density]] of 598.08 persons per km². The total area was 49.99 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.tochigi-sakura.lg.jp/ Sakura official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Tochigi Prefecture]] {{Tochigi-geo-stub}}
